trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException"></xref> class is an exception that occurs in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.StartTransportLayerSecurity(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection)"></xref> method if the request fails.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException.#ctor"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException"></xref> class.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException"></xref> class using the specified response.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"></xref> object returned by the server.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException.#ctor(System.String)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException"></xref> class using the specified message.
The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse,System.String)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException"></xref> class using the specified response and message.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"></xref> object returned by the server.
The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException"></xref> class using the specified serialization data and streaming context.
The data required to serialize the parameter.
The source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the parameter.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException"></xref> class using the specified message and inner exception.
The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
The <xref href="System.Exception.InnerException"></xref>, if any, that threw the exception.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse,System.String,System.Exception)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.TlsOperationException"></xref> class using the specified response, message, and inner exception.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse"></xref> object returned by the server.
The message displayed to the client when the exception occurs.
The <xref href="System.Exception.InnerException"></xref>, if any, that threw the exception.
